mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tokens (user_id, bin_id, uuid, name, token, server, ws_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{binId}, #{uuid}, #{name}, #{token}, #{server}, #{wsUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_tokens WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM user_tokens WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM user_tokens WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM user_tokens WHERE bin_id = #{binId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_tokens WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
DELETE FROM user_tokens WHERE bin_id = #{binId} AND user_id = #{userId}
